text:
The biggest mistake is skipping steps. For example, the mistake that almost all beginners make
is going straight to modeling without a strong idea of what problem is being solved or how to
robustly evaluate candidate solutions. This almost always results in a lot of wasted time. Slow
down, follow the process, and complete each step.
I recommend having separate code for each experiment that can be re-run at any time. This
